abstract: Grand jury returns five-count indictment, including one for first-degree murder, against Oscar Morel in shooting of imam Alauddin Akonjee and assistant Thara Miah in Ozone Park, Queens; Morel is also charged with two counts of second-degree murder and two counts of second-degree criminal possession of weapon.
lead_paragraph: The man accused in the execution-style shooting is charged with one count of first-degree murder, two counts of second-degree murder and two counts of second-degree criminal possession of a weapon.
snippet: The man accused in the execution-style shooting is charged with one count of first-degree murder, two counts of second-degree murder and two counts of second-degree criminal possession of a weapon....

headline.main: Grand Jury Returns Five-Count Indictment in Killing of Queens Imam and Aide
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Returns 5-Count Indictment in Killing of Queens Imam and Aide
